DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate pregnancy rate letrozole CC alone IUI program woman recently surgically treat minimal mild endometriosis .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Letrozole CC Alone IUI Program Cases With Surgically Treated Minimal Mild Endometriosis
DOC.criteria: Patient minimalmild endometriosis recently treat laparoscopy wait period 6 12 month follow procedure No infertility factor . Normal serum basal hormone level well document ovulation Moderate severe endometriosis Dense adnexal and/or ovarian adhesion due pelvic inflammatory disease previous pelvic surgery Age 36 year , BMI 30 kg/m2 woman previous pregnancy
